articles.description: He will be replaced by South Australia's Jordan Buckingham for the two-match series in New Zealand
articles.content: Joel Paris played a key part in Western Australia's final victory  •  Getty Images

articles.title: Sweeping changes give SRH renewed hope | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: SRH have made over 10 changes to their squad from the 2022 season and this time, they seem to have covered all bases
